name: Dragon
mutagen_message: You feel an overwhelming sense of... pride?

name: Crystalline
mutagen_message: A resonant chiming echoes within your bones.
iv_message: For a second, you feel your senses refract.

name: Dragon
description: This Cataclysm lit a fire in your temperament and body both.  Whatever's left of the world, well, it's clearly YOURS.

name: Crystalline
description: You've long left behind the primitive concepts of 'organic matter' and 'laws of physics'.  The constant shining is a little distracting, though.

name: Digitigrade
description: Your ankles and toes have stretched out, and your knees have an odd backwards bend to them.  After some practice, you find that this lets you move a lot faster and jump slightly higher, but severely hampers your balance. [NYI]

name: Leaper
description: Your legs have further changed in shape, their muscles becoming almost awkwardly large.  A lot of your new speed is gone, and you even find it more difficult to walk; however, you can jump with incredible force and efficiency, and hopping is a suitable replacement for walking. [NYI]

name: Quadripedal
description: Your shoulders have reconfigured to catch up with your legs, and you find it easier to move on all fours.  Most clothing won't fit you without modification now, but you move with considerably increased balance and speed. [NYI]

name: Crystal Skin
description: Your skin has grown a thin layer of oddly flexible, glimmering, colorful crystal.  It stands up to most attacks that aren't blunt force, and seems to mask your scent somewhat.

name: Crystal Flesh
description: The crystallization of your skin has spread to your entire body.  The light around you shines through you, casting beautiful colored beams on nearby surfaces.  You're just about immune to everything but blunt attacks now... but shattering sure isn't fun.

name: Inner Light
description: Your crystalline form glows with a faint inner light. [NYI]

name: Jagged
description: Your shape has become sharper, all points and corners and flat planes of crystal.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive moderate damage. [NYI]

name: Clear Thoughts
description: You find it easier to focus, through both pain and mundane distraction. [NYI]

name: Geological Metabolism
description: While the local geological formations don't look all that appealing, it's become apparent that they are -- just barely -- viable for assimilation.  Your levels of sustenance and structural integrity should benefit greatly. [NYI]

name: Infernal Metabolism
description: Something makes you think that the figurative flame in your heart has become quite literal... possibly the dim glow visible at the back of your throat, or the fact that fuels and other flammable materials are starting to smell VERY enticing. [NYI]

name: Breath Weapon
description: Your neck has become notably longer, and its muscles have become stronger to support the added length.  Other changes lower down result in an ability to force yourself to vomit with surprising force, and your stomach contents are now... fairly volatile.  You can also rotate your head MUCH farther now, not that it does much good. [NYI]
//: kinda the same thing as spitter zombies, just with fire

name: Breath Welder
description: Your muzzle has further developed, becoming stronger and slightly more flexible.  Paired with circulation changes in your lungs, you find that you can exhale fire continuously while breathing.  Your muzzle allows you to control the angle and intensity of the fire enough that you can weld with it. [NYI]

name: Plated Scales
description: Your scales have further thickened in most places, taking on a metallic sheen.  They've also moved around a lot, and your dexterity hasn't been affected much. [NYI]
//: TODO: make sure this cancels out THICK_SCALES, will want to add new armor values. may need an override?

name: Tempered Scales
description: Your scales have become slightly oily in appearance.  Your outsides seem to have caught up with your insides, and you now have complete immunity to high temperatures. [NYI]
